original_text: They alone are to enter my sanctuary; they alone are to come near my table to minister before me and serve me as guards.
korean_text: 그들이 내 성소에 들어오며 또 내 상에 가까이 나아와 내게 수종들어 내가 맡긴 직분을 지키되

sentences.original_text: They alone are to enter my sanctuary
they alone are to come near my table
sentences.korean_translation: 그들만이 내 상에 가까이 올 것
